alert.note: Alert for North Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 06 at 2:01PM MDT until August 06 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWEST AND NORTH CENTRAL NEW MEXICO DUE TO HOT, DRY, WINDY, AND UNSTABLE CONDITIONS... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY FOR MUCH OF NORTHERN NEW MEXICO DUE TO HOT, DRY, WINDY, AND UNSTABLE CONDITIONS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR THE NORTHWEST PLATEAU AND NORTH CENTRAL MOUNTAINS... .A very unusual period of critical fire weather is expected to continue through at least Monday evening as exceptionally dry westerly flow impacts northern New Mexico. Hot, dry, windy, and unstable conditions will occur again for several hours Monday afternoon and evening across the northern high terrain, surrounding highlands and upper Rio Grande Valley. Similar conditions may exist Tuesday afternoon and evening over the Northwest Plateau and North Central Mountains. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a Fire Weather Watch...which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. A Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 8 PM MDT this evening. A Red Flag Warning also remains in effect from 11 AM to 8 PM MDT Monday. * AREA AND TIMING...North Central Mountains (Zone 120) until 8 pm MDT this evening, from 11 am to 8 pm MDT Monday and from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * 20 FOOT WINDS...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...7 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.
